title: Manjummal Boys Movie Promotion Event Video
description: As part of the promotional campaign for the 'Manjummal Boys' movie, I had the opportunity to create a video documenting an engaging event held at my college. This event brought together students, faculty, and film enthusiasts to celebrate the filmâ€™s themes and its talented cast.

title: Nightmare Short Video
description: In the creation of the 'Nightmare' short video, I aimed to evoke a sense of suspense and intrigue through visual storytelling. The project involved developing a compelling narrative that explored the themes of fear and uncertainty, capturing the essence of a nightmare experience.

title: ILLUMINATI Dance Choreo
description: In the dance video 'ILLUMINATI' by SUPER30FIVE, I had the exciting opportunity to contribute as the assistant director, VFX artist, and special effects creator. My role involved collaborating closely with the director to shape the visual narrative and ensure the choreography seamlessly integrated with the dynamic effects.

title: Collage Event
description: With the release of the OpenAI GPT Store, I decided to build a SaaS which allows users to collect email addresses from their GPT users. This is a great way to build an audience and monetize your GPT API usage.
